footnote1: We offer a special discounted postal rate for readers of Sicily and Sardinia.
footnote2: All subscriptions are auto-renew, but can be cancelled at anytime.

titleText.title: What type of subscription would you like?
titleText.subTitle: We offer two different subscription types: coupons and home delivery. Coupons are only available to customers in Italy.

type1.title: 6 days, home delivery
type1.desc: Home delivered 6 days a week, excluding Sunday

type2.title: 4 days, home delivery
type2.desc: Home delivered 4 days a week, excluding Sunday

type3.title: 2 days, home delivery
type3.desc: Home delivered 2 days a week, excluding Sunday

type4.title: 1 days, home delivery
type4.desc: Home 1 day a week, excluding Sunday
